thread.title: Atomic bomb test subject of new 'Manhattan' season
thread.title_full: Atomic bomb test subject of new 'Manhattan' season

title: Atomic bomb test subject of new 'Manhattan' season
text:
> Entertainment Atomic bomb test subject of new 'Manhattan' season In this July 6, 2015 photo from a video screen grab, John Benjamin Hickey, who plays scientist Frank Winter in the WGN America series "Manhattan," talks about his role in the show's second season on the set in Santa Fe, N.M. "Manhattan" returns for its second season Tuesday, Oct. 13, on WGN America. (AP Photo/Russell Contreras) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
